t: Brand Owner Case Studies | Hope & Henry
s: Hope & Henry sells beautiful, high-quality, and affordable clothing using organic cotton and sharing profits with the women and men who sew them.

t: Amazon Hope Thrift Store | Amazon Hope
s: Did you know that when you shop at Amazon Hope Thrift Store, you help send the gospel and medical care to the Amazon River? We currently have three locations, and each store carries a wide selection of brand-name clothing, furniture, household items, decor, electronics, bedding, toys and more!
